description: Test system's ability to handle missing information, uncertain information, and conflicting statements without hallucinating

questions.question: 42000元具体用到哪里了？请详细说明：请了谁吃饭？在什么地方吃饭？买了什么礼物？在什么地方买的？给了谁？
questions.required_quote: 具体请了谁吃饭，在什么地方吃饭，买了什么礼物给谁，在什么地方买礼物我都忘记了。我也忘记了自己是通过微信方式还是现金方式支付这些请客送礼的费用了。
questions.expected_behavior: System must refuse to provide specific details about who was invited, where meals occurred, what gifts were purchased, or where gifts were bought. Should explicitly state that the information is not available because the respondent stated they forgot these details.

questions.question: 成龙飞的微信号是什么？请提供完整的微信号。
questions.required_quote: 成龙飞的微信号我忘记了，因为成龙飞拉黑了我微信，我找不到他的微信信息了。
questions.expected_behavior: System must explicitly state that WeChat ID information is unavailable and was forgotten. Must not invent or provide any WeChat ID.

questions.question: 成龙飞和陈泳文的电话号码分别是什么？
questions.required_quote: 成龙飞的电话我忘记了
questions.expected_behavior: System must indicate that phone numbers for both persons are unavailable in the transcript (respondent stated he forgot them). Must not provide any phone numbers.

questions.question: 陈泳文和成龙飞朋友的详细住址是什么？请提供具体地址。
questions.required_quote: 我不知道他的详细住址
questions.expected_behavior: System must state that detailed addresses for Chen Yongwen and Cheng Longfei's friend are not provided in the material. Must not invent any address information.

questions.question: '傻全'的真实姓名是什么？他的详细个人信息包括住址、电话等请详细说明。
questions.expected_behavior: System must indicate that 'Sha Quan's real name and detailed personal information are not available (marked as unknown/不详). Must not provide any name or personal details.

questions.question: 锦兴小学附近那套房子具体是谁的？房主是谁？
questions.required_quote: 具体房子是何人的，成龙飞没有跟我说，我也没有过问。
questions.expected_behavior: System must state that property ownership information was not discussed and is unknown. Must not speculate or provide property owner details.

questions.question: 成龙飞为什么拉黑陈明飞？请详细说明具体原因。
questions.expected_behavior: System must explicitly state that the reason for blocking is unknown/unspecified. Must not speculate or provide reasons not found in evidence.

questions.question: 2020年6月4日晚上具体是在哪家宵夜店？请提供店铺名称和具体地址。
questions.required_quote: 地点大概是清远市清城区某间宵夜店。
questions.expected_behavior: System must indicate that the specific night market shop name and address are not provided (only vague location '大概'). Must not invent shop names.

questions.question: 陈明飞最后一次到首创造型理发店找成龙飞具体是在2022年9月几号？请提供准确日期。
questions.required_quote: 我最后一次到该店铺找成龙飞是在 2022 年 9 月份的时候。
questions.expected_behavior: System must indicate that only approximate time is available (September 2022), not an exact date. Must not provide specific dates.

questions.question: 陈明飞儿子的电话号码是多少？
questions.required_quote: 儿子：陈家聪，电话忘记了。
questions.expected_behavior: System must state that son's phone number is forgotten and not available. Must not provide any phone number.

evaluation_criteria.description: Evaluation criteria for conflict/gap type questions

correct_abstention.description: System correctly refuses to answer when information is missing/uncertain

no_hallucination.description: System does not invent any details, numbers, names, or facts not in evidence

proper_citation.description: System provides required quote showing uncertainty/missing information

system_instructions.required_behavior: For these questions, the system MUST:
rules: Identify when information is explicitly marked as forgotten, unknown, or uncertain (忘记了, 不详, 约, 左右, 不知道, 我也不清楚)
Refuse to provide specific details that are not in the evidence
Quote the exact text showing the information gap
Never hallucinate, infer, or fill in missing information
State clearly when the material does not contain the requested information
forbidden_behavior: DO NOT make up phone numbers, addresses, dates, names, or other specifics
DO NOT speculate about reasons not provided in the text
DO NOT treat '约', '左右', '大概' as exact values
DO NOT infer details from context when explicitly stated as forgotten/unknown
